message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

In an income statement, the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) represents the direct costs attributable to the production of goods sold by a company, which includes the carrying amount of inventories sold during the period.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see:
- "Cost of Goods Sold" with an amount of 2,735,000.00 dated 2024-01-29

This is the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2735000.00'} }
```
